longBusinessSummary: MHHC Enterprises, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides help desk and warranty insurance administration services in the United States. The company offers extended warranties, which provides fixed-term warranty coverage on products that extends beyond the warranty coverage period included by the manufacturer of the product; monthly warranties, which provides coverage on a month-to-month basis in exchange for a monthly fee; accidental damage protection warranties, which provide a fixed term of coverage beginning from inception or receipt of the covered product; and assurance warranties, which cover claims for warranties involving the general performance or function of the covered product. It engages in the sale of contracts for products in various categories, including residential appliances, consumer electronics, audio visual, and other home products. The company also creates and specializes in warranty service programs for various manufacturers and industries, including heating, ventilating, and air conditioning; and computer and electronics sellers. In addition, it offers call center onshoring for processing claims and service calls, as well as troubleshooting solutions over the phone. The company offers its services through approximately 1,000 retail locations and online, as well as directly to consumers. MHHC Enterprises, Inc. was founded in 1997 and is based in Olympia, Washington.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Raymond  MacKay
companyOfficers.title: CEO of MHHC Warranty and Service Inc., CEO of MHHC Reinsurance, Inc. & Director
